summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to security from terrorism; authorizing the City to partner with the State of Washington and King County to receive financial assistance from the Department of Homeland Security (DHS), Office for State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness under the Urban Areas Security Initiative Grant for Federal Fiscal Year 2008 (UASI 08), authorizing an application for allocation of funds under that agreement, increasing appropriations to the Police Department, Fire Department and Department of Information Technology in the 2009 Budget.
